tasks.label: Build Native: Debug
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make -j 12

tasks.label: Build Native: Release
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_release && cd build_release && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 .. && make -j 12

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug LevelDB Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_LEVELDB=1 .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_leveldb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UDisk Test
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make test_units_ukv_embedded_udisk -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Stress Isolated Inserts UMem
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make stress_insert_atomic_isolated_ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Stress Isolated Inserts RocksDB
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make stress_insert_atomic_isolated_ukv_embedded_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Stress Serializable Transactions UMem
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make stress_serializable_transactions_ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Stress Serializable Transactions RocksDB
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make stress_serializable_transactions_ukv_embedded_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Test API
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 .. && make ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug LevelDB Test API
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_LEVELDB=1 .. && make ukv_embedded_leveldb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Test API
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make ukv_embedded_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UMem Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 .. && make benchmark_twitter_ukv_embedded_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug RocksDB Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_ENGINE_ROCKSDB=1 .. && make benchmark_twitter_ukv_embedded_rocksdb -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug Arrow Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 -DUKV_BUILD_API_FLIGHT_CLIENT=1 .. && make bench_twitter_ukv_flight_client_umem -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug UDisk Benchmark
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_TESTS=0 -DUKV_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=1 .. && make bench_twitter_ukv_embedded_udisk -j8

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug Arrow Client
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_API_FLIGHT_CLIENT=1 .. && make test_units_ukv_flight_client -j8 && sleep 5

tasks.label: Build Native: Debug Arrow Server
tasks.command: mkdir -p build_debug && cd build_debug && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DUKV_BUILD_API_FLIGHT_SERVER=1 .. && make ukv_flight_server_umem -j8

tasks.label: Clear Build
tasks.command: rm -rf ./build ./build_* ./bin ./build_version.cc ./.pytest_cache ./tmp/* ./Makefile ./CMakeCache* ./CMakeFiles ./cmake_install.cmake

tasks.label: Count Lines of Code
tasks.command: cloc $(git ls-files)
